policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK RESOURCE Issuing"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtnYXRld2F5Lm90ay5kZWZhdWx0X3Blcm1pdHRlZF9yZXNvdXJjZXN9"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="default_permitted_resources"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:CustomAssertion>
                <L7p:base64SerializedValue></L7p:base64SerializedValue>
            </L7p:CustomAssertion>
            <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
